text: (Dawudi atabanje kumva undi) aravuga ati "Rwose yaguhuguje kuba yagusabye intama yawe ngo ayongere mu ze. Kandi mu byâ€™ukuri, abenshi mu bafatanyije imitungo barahuguzanya, uretse babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza; kandi ni bo bake". Nuko Dawudi amenya ko twamugerageje asaba imbabazi Nyagasani we, yitura hasi yubamye, anicuza (kuri Allah)
